nodes.text: The 3100 Firebrand suit was a type of heat shielding armor enhancement produced by the Min-Dal Company during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire following the Battle of Yavin. The system cost 1000 and kept its wearer protected from high temperatures using active and passing cooling systems, an insulated body glove and heat-proof coating. It could be installed into any suit of armor that covered the entire body and was sealable.

The 3100 Firebrand suit was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013. The same information was also included in the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook released the following year by Fantasy Flight Games.
